title: Compound Interest Formula
text: We have the compound interest formula $$A(t)={P\left(1+\frac{r}{n}\right)}^{nt}$$

title: Given Values
text: We are given the principal P is $$6500$$, the annual interest rate $$r$$ is $$0.036$$, the compounding frequency $$n$$ is $$2$$, and the time $$t$$ is $$20$$.

title: Substitute the Value
text: Plug in the values, we get $$A={\operatorname{6500}\left(1+\frac{0.036}{2}\right)}^{2\times20}$$.
